    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context context)
        Initialize the util.
        参数:
        context - The context to use.

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                              ToastUtil.Mode mode)
        Initialize the util with the mode from user.
        参数:
        context - The context to use.
        mode - The default display mode tu use. EitherToastUtil.Mode.NORMAL or ToastUtil.Mode.REPLACEABLE

      • show

        public static void show(int resId)
        Shot a toast with the text form a resource.
        参数:
        resId - The resource id of the string resource to use.

      • show

        public static void show(java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Shot a toast.
        参数:
        text - The text to show.

      • show

        public static void show(int resId,
                        boolean durationLong)
        Shot a toast with the text form a resource.
        参数:
        resId - The resource id of the string resource to use.
        durationLong - Whether the toast show for a long period of time?

      • show

        public static void show(java.lang.CharSequence text,
                        boolean durationLong)
        Show a toast.
        参数:
        text - The text to show.
        durationLong - Whether the toast show for a long period of time?

      • show

        public static void show(int resId,
                        ToastUtil.Mode mode)
        Shot a toast with the text form a resource.
        参数:
        resId - The resource id of the string resource to use.
        mode - The display mode to use. Either ToastUtil.Mode.NORMAL or ToastUtil.Mode.REPLACEABLE

      • show

        public static void show(java.lang.CharSequence text,
                        ToastUtil.Mode mode)
        Show a toast.
        参数:
        text - The text to show.
        mode - The display mode to use. Either ToastUtil.Mode.NORMAL or ToastUtil.Mode.REPLACEABLE

      • show

        public static void show(int resId,
                        boolean durationLong,
                        ToastUtil.Mode mode)
        Shot a toast with the text form a resource.
        参数:
        resId - resId The resource id of the string resource to use.
        durationLong - Whether the toast show for a long period of time?
        mode - The display mode to use. Either ToastUtil.Mode.NORMAL or ToastUtil.Mode.REPLACEABLE

      • show

        public static void show(java.lang.CharSequence text,
                        boolean durationLong,
                        ToastUtil.Mode mode)
        Show a toast.
        参数:
        text - The text to show.
        durationLong - Whether the toast show for a long period of time?
        mode - The display mode to use. Either ToastUtil.Mode.NORMAL or ToastUtil.Mode.REPLACEABLE
